metadata.synopsis: Repeated AD conversation between the high servent the was firing a servant and the servant whose firing the player stopped.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Go to CTY_Main_A -258; 29; -502) Talk to the gnome, stop him from firing Bailey3) AD plays after dialog

1.speaker: Servant Bailey
1.text: Does Mr Mnemonis know about this, sir?

0.speaker: Chamberlain Mercer
0.text: He doesn't. And I won't tell him - so long as you pull yourself together.
